trans-unit.source: CEF Python is an open source project founded by Czarek Tomczak in 2012 to provide python bindings for the Chromium Embedded Framework. Examples of embedding CEF browser are available for many popular GUI toolkits including: wxPython, PyQt, PySide, Kivy, Panda3D, PyGTK, PyGObject, PyGame/PyOpenGL and PyWin32.
trans-unit.target: CEF Python是一个开源项目,由Czarek Tomczak于2012年创立,为Chromium嵌入式框架提供python绑定。嵌入CEF浏览器的例子可用于许多流行的GUI工具包,包括:wxPython、PyQt、PySide、Kivy、Panda3D、PyGTK、PyGObject、PyGame/PyOpenGL和PyWin32。

trans-unit.source: GUI toolkit for embedding a Chromium widget in desktop applications
trans-unit.target: 用于在桌面应用程序中嵌入Chromium小部件的GUI工具包。

trans-unit.source: There are many use cases for CEF. You can embed a web browser control based on Chromium with great HTML 5 support. You can use it to create a HTML 5 based GUI in an application, this can act as a replacement for standard GUI toolkits like wxWidgets, Qt or GTK. You can render web content off-screen in application that use custom drawing frameworks. You can use it for automated testing of existing applications. You can use it for web scraping or as a web crawler, or other kind of internet bots.
trans-unit.target: CEF有很多使用案例。你可以嵌入一个基于Chromium的web浏览器控件,并提供强大的HTML 5支持。你可以用它在应用程序中创建一个基于HTML 5的GUI,这可以作为标准GUI工具包的替代品,如wxWidgets,Qt或GTK。你可以在使用自定义绘图框架的应用程序中渲染屏幕外的web内容。你可以用它来对现有的应用程序进行自动测试。你可以用它来进行网络抓取,或者作为网络爬虫,或者其他类型的网络机器人。
